#ifndef BEAST_TARGET_H
#define BEAST_TARGET_H

#include "beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetentitywrapper.h"

#include <maya/MFnDependencyNode.h>
#include <maya/MObject.h>

#include <cassert>
#include <map>

namespace beastmaya {

class Entity {
public:
        Entity(const MObject& instance, const MObject& entity);
        virtual ~Entity() {}

        const MObject& getMayaInstance();
        const MObject& getMayaEntity();

        BeastInstancePtr getBeastInstance();
        void setBeastInstance(BeastInstancePtr& instance);

        BeastTargetEntityPtr& getBeastTargetEntity() { return m_targetEntity; }

        std::wstring getEntityName() {
                MFnDependencyNode entity(m_mayaEntity);
                return entity.name().asWChar();
        }
private:
        // Maya API
        MObject m_mayaInstance;
        MObject m_mayaEntity;

        // Beast API
        BeastInstanceWPtr m_beastInstance;
protected:
        BeastTargetEntityPtr m_targetEntity;
};

class FilterSettings {
public:
        float size; // Default filter size here is 0.0, indicating that we wan't no filtering
        float normalDev;
        FilterSettings() : size(1.0f), normalDev(25.0f) { }
        FilterSettings(float filterSize, float filterShape, float filterNormalDev) : size(filterSize), normalDev(filterNormalDev) { }
};
typedef std::map<ILBWorldSpaceFilterComponent, FilterSettings> FilterSettingsMap;

class Target {
public:
        Target(const MObject& targetNode);
        virtual ~Target() {};

        virtual void exportTarget(BeastJob& job) = 0;
        virtual void importTarget() = 0;
        std::wstring getTargetName() { return m_targetName;     }
        BeastTarget& getBeastTarget() { assert(m_beastTarget); return *m_beastTarget; }

        void setWorldSpaceFilterSettings(ILBWorldSpaceFilterComponent component, const FilterSettings& settings);
        bool isWorldSpaceFilterEnabled();
        const FilterSettingsMap& getWorldSpaceFilterSettings();
protected:
        void setBeastTarget(BeastTargetPtr beastTarget);
private:
        std::wstring m_targetName;
        // Beast API
        BeastTargetPtr m_beastTarget;
        FilterSettingsMap m_worldSpaceFilterSettings;
};

typedef std::shared_ptr<Entity> EntityPtr;
typedef std::shared_ptr<Target> TargetPtr;

}

#endif // BEAST_TARGET_H
